title: Design Process for Game-Based Digital Educational Objects to Enhance Visual Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tool utilization and possession of learning motivation
context.additional_context: A blended learning course combining flipped learning with digital educational object (DEO) design in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners enhance visual information analysis competency to over 80% through game-based learning scenarios in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can design and implement digital educational objects (DEOs) in science disciplines based on the ADDIE model.
Learners achieve at least 7 out of 10 visual literacy standard indicators through peer and self-assessment in a flipped learning environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
